publ: by 深圳市伊欧乐科技有限公司
name: MyScale
0:
”Alexa, ask my scale how much weight I've lost this month.”
”Alexa, ask my scale how much is the distance to the goal.”
”Alexa, ask my scale how much do I get from the weight loss target.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my scale
des: If you use My Scale, adding this Alexa Skill is an easy way to up your motivation or simply check in with progress you’ve made. Just ask Alexa about your weight trends, how you body fat last time, or ask for your loss goals.
